alert.note: Alert for Bolivar; Sunflower (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 05 at 2:30AM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Sunflower and northeastern Bolivar Counties through 315 AM CDT... At 229 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Mound Bayou, or 7 miles north of Cleveland, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Parchman and Rome around 255 AM CDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Alligator, Winstonville, Duncan and Merigold. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 400 AM CDT for northwestern Mississippi.
